name: High Ware
description:
After being reprogrammed, you control a sentient program named HIGHWARE_IT.exe, with only one motive to follow; hunt down viruses and terminate their programs, freeing up resources for the Operation System.

Battle through hordes of enemies, avoiding their attacks on one hand while typing on the other to prepare your own attacks. 

A high paced typing/bullet-hell game with a minimal and flashy art style, High Ware takes place in a fictional depiction of the software of a computer.
